text: Goodou mo godou dama daane, dama ahina, godou hege, mo digau Levi ala e noho i lodo godou waahale, goodou gi geina hua nia tigidaumaha aanei i mua o Dimaadua di godou God, i di gowaa dela e hilihili go Dimaadua di godou God. Goodou gi tenetene i di gowaa deelaa gi godou mee huogodoo ala ne hai.
